name: Kodiak Low-Rider Chelsea Boots - Women's
description: Slip-on Chelsea booties that look great with a cuffed jean. Comfort with classic lines, these Low-Rider Chelsea boots use a premium leather that are comfy from step one and get even better with a little wear.Rugged unlined leather upper looks great and wears in well.Leather lined memory foam insole is comfy, supportive and removeable if you want to add your own insole.Grippy rubber outsole is right at home on slick side walks and wet train platforms.
